# resume()

**Instance Method**

Starts processing of incoming requests.

## Declaration

```swift
func resume()
```

## Discussion

All listeners start suspended and must be resumed before they begin processing incoming requests.

If called on the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSXPCListener/service()] object, this method never returns. Therefore, you should call it as the last step inside the XPC service’s `main` function after setting up any desired initial state and configuring the listener itself.

If called on any other [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSXPCListener], the connection is resumed, and the method returns immediately.

## Managing connection state

- **activate()**: Activates the listener.
- **invalidate()**: Invalidates the listener.
- **suspend()**: Suspends the listener.
title: resume()
